title: IMF Bentham in $139m raising for acquisition
text:
Listed litigation funder IMF Bentham is in front of investors seeking $139 million in fresh funds.

The company is seeking to raise $19 million in a placement of new shares at $3.50 each and $120 million in a rights issue at $3.40.

Funds raised were to acquire European litigation funder Omni Bridgeway Holding.

IMF shares went into a trading halt on Tuesday morning. Daniel Munoz

The placement was priced at a 7.4 per cent discount to the last close, while the rights issue was at an 8.6 per cent discount to the placement adjusted theoretical ex-rights price and a 10.1 per cent discount to the last close.

The rights issue was structured as a one-for-5.8 entitlement offer.
description: Listed litigation funder IMF Bentham is in front of investors seeking $139 million in fresh funds.
